game.name: Spin, Baby, Spin!
game.shortDescription: Spin, Baby, Spin! is a short incremental game about slot machines. Spin the reels, upgrade your income and drop chances, craft new slot machines, and collect powerful artifacts. Choose your talent cards and earn enough chips to buy back your soul from a demonic clown!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Spin, Baby, Spin! is a short incremental game about slot machines. Spin the reels, upgrade your income and drop chances, craft new slot machines, and collect powerful artifacts. Choose your talent cards and earn enough chips to buy back your soul from a demonic clown!
